name: Rickety Rocket (Carooke)
description:
Rickety Rocket is a game I made for a Highscore Game Jam. I used it as an opportunity to build a style of game I had never tried before, inspired by the flash games I used to play when I was younger, such as Learn 2 Fly. 

It was also to challenge myself to build a small save system, which powers the Highscore system. I hope you enjoy, please let me know what you think!
